definition: a scholar or government official living in one's village/a village gentleman/squire
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: The traditional melodrama of the wicked squire and rustic tenant.
sentences.chinese: 關於邪惡鄉紳和土氣佃農的傳統傳奇劇。

sentences.english: All animals in the experiment were halo- thane negative.
sentences.chinese: 所有動物在實驗是光暈大鄉紳陰性。

sentences.english: Does not he drive for Squire Make-a-stir?
sentences.chinese: 不就是替一個有權有勢的鄉紳趕車嗎？

sentences.english: The whole place was the romantic vision of the paternalist local squire.
sentences.chinese: 這整個地方就是那位家長式鄉紳的浪漫想象。

sentences.english: No, ' said the squire. ' Hands was one of them. '
sentences.chinese: “不，”鄉紳說，“漢茲就是他們的人。”

sentences.english: There is not among them an esquire, saving the unlettered magistrate.
sentences.chinese: 他們當中除了那個目不識丁的執事，沒有一個鄉紳。

sentences.english: Which of these is the actual structure of thane ?
sentences.chinese: 大鄉紳的真實結構是這些當中哪一個？

sentences.english: In the meantime, the squire and Captain Smollett were still on pretty distant terms with one another.
sentences.chinese: 在這期間，鄉紳和斯摩萊特船長的關係仍然相當緊張。

sentences.english: Good-day to you, sir, and all our dooties to the squire and Cap'n Smollett.
sentences.chinese: 再見，先生，請代我們向鄉紳和斯莫列特船長問好。

sentences.english: I had never seen Squire Trelawney so near .
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒這麼近打量過鄉紳屈利勞尼。

sentences.english: Mr Ar-row met us, and it was clear that he and the squire were very friendly .
sentences.chinese: 埃羅正在那裏等我們，顯然他和鄉紳非常友好。

sentences.english: The squire and Dr Llvesey were delighted.
sentences.chinese: 鄉紳和李甫西大夫都非常高興。

definition: to open up land for cultivation
Guangning county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong
mutiny/(Tw) to be dumped by one's girlfriend while serving in the army
twisted roots and intertwined joints (idiom); complicated and very tricky/knotty and deeply-rooted difficulties
Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
Xianyou county in Putian 莆田[Pu2 tian2], Fujian
Laiyang county level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
